task_description: Compound associated with drug-induced liver injury (DILI)
instruction: Given molecule with the provided SMILES and molecular structure image, this compound is associated with drug-induced liver injury (DILI). Please modify its structure to reduce hepatotoxicity while maintaining its primary therapeutic function.
focus_points: Functional groups that can be bioactivated to reactive metabolites by hepatic enzymes (especially CYP450)
Structural elements that may disrupt mitochondrial function in hepatocytes
Features that may inhibit bile acid transport proteins leading to cholestasis
Moieties that could trigger immune-mediated hepatotoxicity
Structural elements with high lipophilicity that may accumulate in liver tissue
output_format: Please suggest modifications that would likely reduce the compound's potential for causing liver injury while preserving its intended pharmacological activity.
